long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1️⃣ Seamless GPTs Access
    ✅ Direct access to GPTs without needing a ChatGPT Plus subscription
    ✅ Additional GPTs usage pack
    ✅ Lift the 40 uses/3 hours usage cap
    ✅ Utilize GPTs directly on leading GPT navigation sites
    ✅ Engage with GPTs anytime outside of ChatGPT

2️⃣ Chat Interface Enhancements
    ✅ Update the conversation page icon to the latest GPTs logo
    ✅ Assign shortcut keys for easy navigation through past chats

📦 Other Cool Features:
     ✅ Cross-Platform:  not just for web app，also plus extensions for Chrome and Edge. One account, access everywhere.

1️⃣ 随时开启 GPTs 对话
    ✅ 免开 ChatGPT Plus 会员直接使用 GPTs
    ✅ GPTs 用量加油包
    ✅ 解除 40次/3h 使用频次限制
    ✅ 在主流 GPTs 导航网站上直接使用 GPTs

2️⃣ 聊天界面优化
    ✅ 修改对话网页图标为当前 GPTs 图标

📦 其他酷炫特性:
